_comment: Each challenge needs: name, period_start/end (YYYY-MM-DD), goal, type, type_display, status (current|past), activity_types. For past challenges include a 'rows' array with the finalized leaderboard data so it is preserved when the sync script runs.

challenges.name: Wafa Wafa
challenges.goal: Rack up the most total elevation gain across all your activities this month

challenges.name: Spine Challenge
challenges.goal: Rack up the most total elevation gain across all your activities this month

challenges.name: The Glen Striders Challenge
challenges.goal: Log the longest distance in a single activity this month
